data.question: What is the empirical formula of the palladium complex 8?
data.answer: C38 H26 Cs2 F14 N2 O8 Pd2

data.question: At what temperature was the X-ray crystallographic analysis of palladium complex 8 conducted?
What is the space group of the palladium complex 8?
What is the bond length between Pd(1) and N(1) in the palladium complex 8?
Is the crystal system of palladium complex 8 orthorhombic?
Does the palladium complex 8 have a unit cell volume of 4415.4(3) Å3?
Is the density of palladium complex 8 calculated as 1.081 Mg/m3?
What is the maximum transmission value for palladium complex 8?
What method was used for absorption correction in the analysis of palladium complex 8?
What is the final R index (I>2sigma(I)) for palladium complex 8?
Is the bond angle between C(1)-Pd(1)-N(1) in palladium complex 8 greater than 120 degrees?
What is the yield percentage of the desired product 3a from the trifluoromethylation of complex 8?
Was trifluoroacetamide effective in improving the yield of the trifluoromethylation reaction?
What role does N-methylformamide (L4) play in the trifluoromethylation reaction?
data.answer: It acts as a ligand in addition to its action as a base.

data.question: Is the reaction yield improved by increasing the amount of Cu(OAc)2?
What is the effect of replacing Cu(OAc)2 with Yb(OTf)3 in the reaction?
data.answer: It resulted in loss of reactivity.

data.question: Does the absence of TFA have a deleterious effect on the yield of 3a?

What is the yield percentage for the trifluoromethylation of p-methyl-substituted arene?
Is the yield of the trifluoromethylation reaction sensitive to the structure of the formamide additives?
